ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hot Rod looked at Kamodia. She said we cant, untill she pulls off a rescue mission. She hasn t gone anywhere yet. ... He looked out, seeing no Maximals.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod looked at Kamodia.
"She said we cant, untill she pulls off a rescue mission. She hasn't
gone anywhere yet."

::DrillBit::

He looked out, seeing no Maximals.

::K-9::

K-9 was tired of running. He found a nice spot to lay down, and went to
sleep.
